title: AB de Royse777
author: AB de Royse777
created_time: July 18, 2023, 08:59:52 PMLast edit: August 21, 2023, 06:27:10 AM by Royse777
content: ..This is a self-moderated thread to keep it clean only for review applications and reviews to receive. Please click here for any discussion and Q/A regarding review service and Mixin safe process...QuoteMixin Ltd, a Hong Kong-based company, has developed Mixin Safe, a suite of decentralized custody solutions. The product is designed to offer enhanced security for digital investments, and Mixin Ltd doesn't hold any assets belonging to its customers...Note:.. This campaign will be closed once we approve 100 applications. You will be selected in batch. Each batch will have a deadline to submit the review. Please do not miss the deadline or your review will be rejected...Todo:.. You should at least create a Mixin Safe, make a deposit and send a transaction to make a complete review. ..Click here for user guide..- Prepare Owner Wallet: Â Ledger, Bitcoin Core, Bitbox, Coldcard, Mornin key, etc.- Prepare Members Wallet: Get Mixin Messenger- Set Mixin Messenger PIN- Add Mixin Messenger Contacts: Please ask all safe members to add each other as a contact in Mixin Messenger, including yourself.- Set Emergency Contact: Please ask all safe members to set an emergency contact in Mixin Messenger, including yourself.- Sign in Mixin Safe- Write a constructive review that worth to receive 0.003 BTC of your experience using Mixin Safe.Quote from: cedricfung on July 17, 2023, 05:28:29 AMHi, from the Mixin Safe team. The price shows on the website are meant to be the pricing proposal when product fully launched. For test, the price is very cheap, starts at $2 per year, and it includes a free transaction to send, so $2 is the minimum cost for a tester. ..Terms:.. - You need to be at-least Full Member+ and need to have at-least 50+ lifetime earned merit.- You need to apply with a Bech32 address. Please start your review once you are accepted and paid.- Please submit the review within the deadline assigned to you or your review will be rejected and you will need to refund the payment that was sent- I and Mixin Safe team reserve the right to reject any application, even review.- To active Mixin Messenger, you can use a throwaway phone number- This review will be conducted using First Come First Serve method however, you need to wait for me to accept your application.- No alternative accounts please. If found you entered more than one account, you will be tagged- No AI or ChatGPT contents, if found you will be asked for a refund and will be banned from any kind of signature and review campaign...How to apply:..  Post the following information.Code:Bitcointalk Rank:Lifetime earned merit:Bech32 address:..How to submit the review:.. 1. Post the review in this thread using following format:Code:Bitcointalk username: <YOUR BITCOINTALK USERNAME><YOUR REVIEW>2. Fill up the forum with the link of the review so that I can easily locate your reviewQuote..Master Spreadsheet | Report form..ðŸ“£This campaign is designed and managed by:General Disclaimer: We would like to make it clear that ðŸ’¹ðŸ“ˆ Bitcointalk Campaign Management ðŸ’ªðŸ”¥ Signature & Bounty, managed by Bitcointalk member Royse777, is an independent entity and is not directly affiliated with any of the crypto startups we advertise. While we strive to promote these startups in the best possible light, our views and opinions expressed in our advertising materials do not necessarily reflect those of the startups themselves. We work with various clients across the crypto industry, and our goal is to provide high-quality advertising services to help them achieve their marketing objectives.Payment Disclaimer: Please always check the escrow wallet (if available). If the escrow wallet does not have enough balance and you think you have risk not to get paid then discontinue from the campaign. We are not liable to pay you anything that is not available on the escrow wallet.
